lines.text: I think we need a compass.
Compass, bumpass! I don't need no stinkin' compass!
The nerve of that comfort doll! I wouldn't help her now if she was being eaten by razor-sharp teeth.

[shouts]
Help! I'm being eaten by razor-sharp teeth!
You know, Squish, you're pretty smart for a guy that lives in the bathroom.
I never want to see you ever, ever, ever, *ever* again!
Well, that's just fine with me!
If I can beat him, great! If not... see you in the reruns, folks.
